title: ESLint configuration type incompatible error
body:
### Describe the bug

```
Type 'import("node_modules/.pnpm/@typescript-eslint+utils@8.7.0_eslint@9.11.1_typescript@5.6.2/node_modules/@typescript-eslint/utils/dist/ts-eslint/Config").FlatConfig.LanguageOptions | undefined'
is not assignable to type 'import("node_modules/.pnpm/eslint@9.11.1/node_modules/eslint/lib/types/index").Linter.LanguageOptions | undefined'.

Type 'import("node_modules/.pnpm/@typescript-eslint+utils@8.7.0_eslint@9.11.1_typescript@5.6.2/node_modules/@typescript-eslint/utils/dist/ts-eslint/Config").FlatConfig.LanguageOptions'
is not assignable to type 'import("node_modules/.pnpm/eslint@9.11.1/node_modules/eslint/lib/types/index").Linter.LanguageOptions'.

Types of property 'parser' are incompatible.
```

### Reproduction

```
create-svelte version 6.3.11

┌  Welcome to SvelteKit!
│
◇  Which Svelte app template?
│  Skeleton project
│
◇  Add type checking with TypeScript?
│  Yes, using TypeScript syntax
│
◇  Select additional options (use arrow keys/space bar)
│  Add ESLint for code linting, Add Prettier for code formatting, Try the Svelte 5 preview (unstable!)
│
└  Your project is ready!
```

### Logs

_No response_

### System Info

```Shell

	CPU: (10) arm64 Apple M1 Pro
	Memory: 24.23 MB / 16.00 GB
	Shell: 5.9 - /bin/zsh
Binaries:
	Node: 22.9.0 - ~/.local/state/fnm_multishells/55518_1727352408779/bin/node
	npm: 10.8.3 - ~/.local/state/fnm_multishells/55518_1727352408779/bin/npm
	pnpm: 9.11.0 - ~/.local/state/fnm_multishells/55518_1727352408779/bin/pnpm
Browsers:
	Chrome: 129.0.6668.70
	Edge: 129.0.2792.52
	Safari: 17.6
npmPackages:
	@sveltejs/adapter-auto: ^3.0.0 => 3.2.5 
	@sveltejs/kit: ^2.0.0 => 2.5.28 
	@sveltejs/vite-plugin-svelte: ^4.0.0-next.6 => 4.0.0-next.7 
	svelte: ^5.0.0-next.1 => 5.0.0-next.259 
	vite: ^5.0.3 => 5.4.8
```

### Severity

annoyance

### Additional Information
